description:
A desert hike, that surprise passes a small pond with surrounding palms in the middle of otherwise very dry country. It's also very near the San Andreas fault.
It's a hike in the Coachella Valley Preserve
http://coachellavalleypreserve.org/
Trail is well marked, much of it is loose sand.
directions: From Thousand Palms, east on Ramon Rd,  then north or Thousand Palm Canyon road to the visitor centre. Trail head is in the parking lot.
title: McCallum Pond - Moon Country
